main event: Witness reports seeing a bright light on a country road, approximately 1 yard long and 1.5 to 2 feet wide, moving slowly at about 3 mph before it seemed to explode.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds,The object was described as a blue-green light,The object appeared to fall apart as if it exploded,The estimated altitude of the object was around 21,000 feet,The weather was clear during the sighting.
sighted object: a bright blue-green light resembling an object about the size of a basketball
witness description: The witness was walking on a country road.
